duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the financials, maintenance, insurance, and service delivery for a community of people.
Provide overall business supervision of a community association and have daily interactions with internal and external customers including homeowners, vendors, board members and committee members.

education_certification.credential: Combination of education and experience; some college preferred. Two years of customer service experience. Three to Five years of community management experience. Financial and accounting acumen. Project management experience a plus.
